site.title: Vistacampo - Addiction Rehabilitation Center in Colonia Tovar
site.description: Specialized center for addiction treatment in Colonia Tovar, Venezuela. We offer medical detox, individual and group therapy in a safe and confidential environment.

cta.ready: Ready to take the first step?
cta.text: If you feel you’ve hit rock bottom and it’s time to make the decision to pause, recover your life, and free yourself from the terrible dependence on alcohol and other drugs; if you can’t bear to see your family and friends suffer as a consequence of your uncontrollable use; then, count on us.

goals.title: Treatment objectives
goals.description: Our therapeutic program is designed to achieve comprehensive and sustainable recovery, addressing all aspects of addiction and its consequences.

cards.title: Comprehensive diagnosis
cards.text: Identify and correctly diagnose the degree of dependence, including medications, possible complications, and organic and psychological alterations.

cards.title: Therapeutic strategies
cards.text: Develop effective therapeutic strategies to accompany the patient during treatment, creating awareness of the illness, moving away from use, and learning to live with dignity.

cards.title: Comprehensive reintegration
cards.text: Achieve gradual family, social, and professional reintegration until normality is reached in all areas of life in a full and satisfactory way.

cards.title: Family support
cards.text: Ensure that relatives and partners understand addiction, get actively involved in the recovery process, and address their own co-addiction.

phases.title: Treatment phases
phases.description: The length of stay depends on each patient’s evolution and adaptation. As a guideline, most patients complete a 16 to 20-week program, going through the 4 fundamental phases.

items.title: Detoxification
items.subtitle: First 15–20 days
items.text: It begins on the day of admission and continues for the first fifteen to twenty days. During this period, intervention focuses on physical detoxification under strict observation by the medical team.
points: Rest, balanced nutrition, and sleep recovery
Initial exercise routine plus individual and group therapies

items.title: Habit reversal
items.subtitle: Changing habits and behaviors
items.text: Years of use and addiction disrupt normal life, interrupt growth and maturity, and lead to harmful habits, behaviors, patterns, and beliefs.
points: Replace them with a new life structure
Improve relationships with oneself and family
items.imageAlt: Habit change and habit reversal process

items.title: Rehabilitation
items.subtitle: Personal growth and skill development
items.text: Continue the process of personal growth and develop the skills that were interrupted due to drug use.
points: Art therapy, yoga, and physical exercise
Recovery of self-esteem and personal dignity

items.title: Reintegration
items.subtitle: Preparation for normal life
items.text: During the stay, especially in the final weeks, the patient is prepared for reintegration into family, social, and work environments.
points: Post-discharge guidance and counseling for 2–5 years

faq.title: We answer your questions
faq.description: The most common questions about our treatment and recovery process.

items.q: How long does the complete treatment take?
items.a: The length of treatment varies according to each patient’s individual needs. Typically, the residential program lasts between 30 and 90 days, followed by a follow-up program that can extend for 12 months or more. Our team constantly evaluates progress to determine the optimal duration.

Absolutely. We maintain the strictest medical confidentiality. All patient information is protected by professional secrecy and is only shared with the patient’s express consent or in cases required by law. Our facilities are designed to ensure total privacy.

items.q: What types of addictions do you treat?
items.a: We treat addictions to alcohol, cocaine, marijuana, tobacco, e-cigarettes, prescription pills, designer drugs, and emotional eating. We also address addictive behaviors such as gambling, video games, social media, work, sex, sports, and cosmetic surgeries.

items.q: Can the family participate in the treatment?
items.a: Yes, family participation is essential in our therapeutic approach. We offer family therapy sessions, educational programs for relatives, and support groups. We believe recovery is more effective when the whole family is involved and receives the necessary support.

Our commitment continues after discharge. We provide a personalized follow-up plan that includes regular consultations, support groups, maintenance therapy, and access to community resources. We also offer a 24/7 support line for crisis situations and a relapse prevention program.

cta.text: Our specialized team is ready to design a personalized treatment plan tailored to your specific needs.
